com.siperian.sif.message

Class AsynchronousOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.AsynchronousOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AsynchronousOptions
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The asynchronous processing parameters for a SiperianRequest.

    When Siperian Hub receives a request with isAsynchronous set to true, it places the request on a JMS Queue for processing and immediately returns a response acknowledging the request.

    If jmsReplyTo is set, Siperian Hub posts the response to the specified JMS Queue. If not set, the response is discarded.

    If jmsCorrelationId is set, Siperian Hub sets the JMS correlationId of the response message to the specified value.

    See Also:
    SiperianRequest, Serialized Form
